item.title: Biden commutes nearly 2,500 more sentences in final days of presidency
item.description: President Biden is commuting the sentences of nearly 2,500 inmates convicted of non-violent drug offenses in the final days of his presidency.

item.title: 'Woke green hydrogen bomb': Historian blasts California leaders for 'nonsensical' wildfire response
item.description: American historian Victor Davis Hanson criticizes the "failures" of local and state leadership amid Los Angeles' wildfire mitigation efforts.
